word: The Lord has declared that He will never leave thee nor forsake thee. When He revealed His character to Moses, He "passed by before him, and proclaimed, The Lord, the Lord God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant in goodness and truth, keeping mercy for thousands, forgiving iniquity and transgression and sin, and that will by no means clear the guilty." "His eyes behold, His eyelids try, the children of men." "The Lord is a God of knowledge, and by Him actions are weighed." "I the Lord search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings."
